Interface ButtonServerRpc

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable, ServerRpc
public interface ButtonServerRpc
extends ServerRpc

RPC interface for calls from client to server.

Since:
7.0

Method Summary

          Button click event.

          Indicate to the server that the client has disabled the button as a result of a click.

void disableOnClick()
